appraisal.reason: Per this newsletter, Confessions are Monday to Friday from 12:15pm to 12:40pm, not 12:00pm to 12:40pm. On Saturdays, Confessions run from 5:30pm to 5:55pm, not until 6:00pm. No Sunday Confessions are listed.

name: Our Lady of Mount Carmel & St Simon Stock

appraisal.reason: Per the bulletin, Sunday confessions are heard fifteen minutes before every Mass, not simply 'before every Mass'. Weekday confessions remain 12:00–12:55 and Saturday confessions remain 11:00–12:00 and 17:45–17:55.
According to the parish bulletin, confessions are held on Mondays and Fridays from 12:00pm to 12:30pm (or as requested), not only on Mondays 11:30am–12:15pm. Please refer to the published schedule.
